action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be an abstract collection of pixelated shapes in various colors. There is a purple cross shape at the top left, connected to a series of green blocks that form a zigzag pattern. This pattern is connected to an orange zigzag shape that extends towards the bottom left of the image. There is a separate pink shape towards the top right that resembles a letter 'P' or a flag on a pole. There is also an isolated pink 'T' shape towards the right edge of the image. The background is white, and the overall image lacks any discernible real-world objects or figures; it is purely abstract with no clear meaning.
continue
